short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Noņem apnicīgos banerus no LV mājaslapām, kas pieprasa AdBlockera izslēgšanu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove the annoying POP-UP banners that prohibit you to use the website with Ad Blocker, created for Latvian Websites

Works for:
delfi.lv
apollo.lv
tvnet.lv
